tagline: IT Student | Full-Stack Developer | Problem Solver

about.bio: Passionate IT student specializing in full-stack development and cloud technologies. Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science with a focus on building scalable web applications and solving complex technical challenges. Eager to contribute to innovative projects and grow as a software engineer.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.short: Full-stack e-commerce web application with user authentication, shopping cart, and payment integration.
projects.longText:
Developed a complete e-commerce platform from scratch using the MERN stack.

• Implemented secure user authentication with JWT tokens
• Built responsive UI with React and Material-UI
• Created RESTful API with Node.js and Express
• Integrated Stripe payment gateway
• Deployed on Heroku with MongoDB Atlas
• Achieved 95+ Lighthouse performance score

projects.title: Task Manager App
projects.short: Productivity application with real-time collaboration, drag-and-drop interface, and notifications.
projects.longText:
A modern task management application with collaborative features.

• Real-time updates using Socket.io
• Drag-and-drop interface with React Beautiful DnD
• Push notifications for task deadlines
• Dark mode support
• Responsive design for mobile and desktop
• Used by 50+ students in my university

projects.title: AI Chatbot
projects.short: Intelligent chatbot using NLP for customer support automation and FAQ handling.
projects.longText:
Built an AI-powered chatbot for automated customer service.

• Natural language processing with Python
• TensorFlow for intent classification
• Flask backend API
• React frontend with chat interface
• Trained on 1000+ conversation samples
• 85% accuracy in intent recognition

highlights: Developed and maintained features for web applications using React and Node.js
Collaborated with senior developers on code reviews and best practices
Reduced API response time by 30% through database query optimization
Participated in daily standups and sprint planning meetings
Led a team of 5 students in developing the club's official website
Organized weekly coding workshops for 30+ students
Mentored junior students in web development fundamentals
Managed project timelines and deliverables using Agile methodology
Built custom websites for 3 local small businesses
Delivered projects on time and within budget
Provided ongoing maintenance and technical support
Increased client website traffic by average of 40%
